course_description: Human and environmental health are incredibly intertwined. This course will introduce the relationships emerging between humans, animals and environmental change and examine health issues, scientific understanding of causes, and possible future approaches to global environmental and health problems.
sections: Class Nbr: 2336, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: G. Vazquez Prokopec, Status: Open
